nodes.text: Sean Stewart (born June 2, 1965) is an American-Canadian author of fiction novels and game content. As the lead writer on The Beast, Stewart has been called an inventor of alternate reality gaming (ARG). Stewart went on to join the founding team of 42 Entertainment and served as the lead writer for ilovebees, Last Call Poker and Cathy's Book. Stewart made his first entry into the Star Wars universe with the Clone Wars novel Yoda: Dark Rendezvous.
